findings.title: PVE-007: Proper DMMPool Initialization On Liquidity
findings.description: The current pool initialization logic can be improved by considering price curve amplification when calculating liquidity at the first time.

findings.title: Improved Logic of transferExceedAmount()
findings.description: The `transferExceedAmount()` function can be improved to specify a maximum time window for the beneficiary to claim and allow the owner to claim back remaining balance if the time window has passed.
